channel.title: Personal on Yalchin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Yalchin's Blog

item.title: First Personal Blog
item.description: So far I was trying to keep this website’s content identical to yalchin.info/blog which is my main website where I mainly write mixed tech blogs to solve some problems. I usually write those blogs not because I’m expert at them, but I write them, first, as a reference and second, as contribution to the growing programming society. Anyway, I was planning to write this post about my switch from Android (have been using it since I got my first phone) to IOS, but then I thought I might include some personal details as well.
